events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as software engineer, developer, and coding skills mentioned.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidateâ€™s profile for better focused communication.
Initial screening call was conducted with the candidate to discuss their experience with software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate responded positively to the screening and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team and contributing to development projects.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the senior software engineers to assess their coding abilities and problem-solving skills.
